flavorText: Doyo suspected the boggarts of brewing a plot against his crop, so he scythed away his grain to clear the sightlines.

foreignData.flavorText: Doyo vermutete, dass die Boggarts einen Raubzug auf seine Ernte planten. Daher senste er das Getreide ab, um bessere Sicht zu haben.
foreignData.name: Nebelwiesenschleicher
foreignData.text: Lebensverknüpfung, Schutz vor umgewandelten Manakosten von 3 oder höher

foreignData.flavorText: Doyo sospechaba que los boggarts estaban conspirando contra su cosecha, así que segó todo su grano para que nada entorpeciera la visión.
foreignData.name: Furtivo de Pradera Brumosa
foreignData.text: Vínculo vital, protección contra coste de maná convertido de 3 o mayor.

foreignData.flavorText: Doyo soupçonnait que les boggarts préparaient un mauvais coup, alors il faucha son blé pour avoir une vision dégagée du champ.
foreignData.name: Indolent brumeprairie
foreignData.text: Lien de vie, protection contre le coût converti de mana 3 ou plus

foreignData.flavorText: Doyo sospettava che i boggart stessero tramando qualche complotto contro il suo raccolto, quindi falciò il grano per liberare la visuale.
foreignData.name: Lavativo della Prateria Brumosa
foreignData.text: Legame vitale, protezione da costo di mana convertito pari o superiore a 3.

foreignData.flavorText: 自分の農作物に悪巧みを働くボガートがいると信じたドーヨーは、見通しを良くするために畑を全部刈り取った。
foreignData.name: ミストメドウの身隠し
foreignData.text: 絆魂、プロテクション（点数で見たマナ・コストが３以上）
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — キスキン・ならず者

foreignData.flavorText: Doyo suspeitava que os papões planejavam um ataque à sua plantação, portanto ceifou sua seara para visualizar o horizonte.
foreignData.name: Camuflador de Nevoplanície
foreignData.text: Vínculo com a vida, proteção contra custo de mana convertido maior ou igual a 3.

foreignData.flavorText: Когда Дойо заподозрил, что боггарты замышляют недоброе против его посевов, он скосил хлеба, чтобы улучшить обзор.
foreignData.name: Скрытник из Туманолужья
foreignData.text: Цепь жизни, Защита от конвертированной мана-стоимости 3 или больше

foreignData.flavorText: 多佑怀疑波尬正打他的谷物主意，于是把谷子全刈平好让视野畅通。
foreignData.name: 雾牧地潜伏客
foreignData.text: 系命，保护（总法术力大于或等于3）

name: Mistmeadow Skulk
originalText: Lifelink, protection from converted mana cost 3 or greater

rulings.text: While a spell with X in its cost is on the stack, its mana value takes the chosen value of X into account. Mistmeadow Skulk can be chosen as a target for a Blaze (which has mana cost {X}{R}) if X is 0 or 1, for example, but it can’t be chosen as a target for a Blaze if X is 2 or more.
A face-down creature has a mana value of 0, so Mistmeadow Skulk doesn’t have protection from it .

The protection ability means the following: - Mistmeadow Skulk can’t be blocked by creatures with mana value 3 or greater. - Mistmeadow Skulk can’t be enchanted by Auras with mana value 3 or greater. It also can’t be equipped by Equipment with mana value 3 or greater. - Mistmeadow Skulk can’t be targeted by spells with mana value 3 or greater. It also can’t be targeted by abilities from sources with mana value 3 or greater. - All damage that would be dealt to Mistmeadow Skulk by sources with mana value 3 or greater is prevented.

text: Lifelink, protection from mana value 3 or greater
